item.title: settings.php: Adding reference to settings.local.php
item.description: /** * Load local development override configuration, if available. * * Use settings.local.php to override variables on secondary (staging, * development, etc) installations of this site. Typically used to disable * caching, JavaScript/CSS compression, re-routing of outgoing emails, and * other things that should not happen on development and testing sites. * * Keep this code block at the end of this file to take full effect. */ if (file_exists(__DIR__ .
